content: pattern #2014 free42 created 02/01/2015 granny stitch cowl before starting size one size finished measurements 43 around and 10 wide difficulty easy yarn 250-300 yards of 2 fine sport baby i used candy by meimei in turquoise this yarn is for sale in my etsy shop hook size g-6 4 00mm notions stitch markers yarn needle & scissors abbreviations chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet instructions notes chain 1 does not count as a stitch cowl is worked in rounds chain 2 counts as a double_crochet chain 168 loosely making sure not to twist the chain join to make a circle round 1 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st and each st around join to first half_double_crochet round 2 chain 2 2 double_crochet in same st *skip 2 sts 3 double_crochet in next st chain 1 repeat from * to end join to top of chain 2 round 3 slip_stitch to next chain 1 space chain 2 2 double_crochet in same st chain 1 *skip 2 sts 3 double_crochet in next st chain 1 repeat from * to end join to top of chain 2 round 4 19 repeat round 3 round 20 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st and each st and chain 2 space around join to first half_double_crochet fasten_off and sew in all loose ends the steady hand crochet patterns by aprile mazey aprile@thesteadyhandshop com please do not share or publish this pattern finished items may be sold i would very much appreciate it if you would credit aprile mazey for the pattern design and include a link to http //www thesteadyhandshop com all pictures in this pdf are the property of the steady hand please do not copy or use any of my photos in this document or online thanks
